text: 15.27 Lom 9.4, 11.17, 1 Ko 9.11, Gal 6.6 Gos kɨli ke nɨŋɨd gɨlak anɨb ak tep gɨlak. Taynen? Tap kɨli Juda binɨb kɨlop pen ogɨnap ñeb tek mɨdeb. Juda binɨb kɨli God takaw ne ak dɨl, binɨb Juda mel okok kɨli God nop gos nɨgɨnɨgel agɨl, kɨlop agñak. Anɨb ak tek, binɨb Juda mel okok tap day olap mɨdeb. Kɨli mani tap kɨli mɨdeb ak ogɨnap dɨl, Juda binɨb okok kɨlop pen ñɨnɨgel.
